pkgmetadata.longdescription: Soft-Discretization-Based Bayesian Network Inference // Fitting discrete Bayesian networks using soft-discretized data. Soft- discretization is based on mixture of normal distributions. Also implemented is a supervised Bayesian network learning employing Kullback-Leibler divergence. For more information see Balov (2013) DOI:10.1186/1755-8794-6-S3-S1.
